# GitHub Repository Setup

## Repository Description

Add this description to your GitHub repository:

```
Temporal emotion recognition on AFEW-VA using CLIP vision encoders with LoRA fine-tuning, contrastive pretraining, and CCC-supervised regression for continuous valence/arousal prediction.
```

## Suggested Topics

Add these topics to your repository for better discoverability:

- `clip`
- `lora`
- `emotion-recognition`
- `temporal-transformer`
- `affective-computing`
- `contrastive-learning`
- `pytorch`
- `computer-vision`
- `video-understanding`
- `valence-arousal`
- `deep-learning`

## How to Add

1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click the ⚙️ gear icon next to "About" on the right side
3. Add the description in the "Description" field
4. Add topics in the "Topics" field (separate with commas or spaces)
5. Click "Save changes"

This takes ~30 seconds and makes the repository much more professional.
